content.text:
[@Stitchedgod](@0qsLRG26pj+oQjex3fYu2uemzIvLmVDB8s+QjxLts6Y=.ed25519) 

Oh, that makes *so* much more sense, thanks! My local area is pretty progressive, but I have a parent who has very different feelings, especially regarding the number of "valid" genders. It's incredibly frustrating, but I think eventually I think/hope that that will change over time. Anyway, sorry for the misunderstanding, cheers!
